title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture          The canyon has been a mighty barrier to humans. Only its rims, never the gorge, show evidence of human occupation - not even by Ute Indians living in the area since written history began. Left, Kolb Expedition of 1916. People » Places » Stories » Collections »
